description:
Jason George is headed to Lifetime... and into a coven.Jason George去Lifetime电视台...出演巫师剧。

The ABC staple (Grey's Anatomy, Mistresses) has signed on for Lifetime's Witches of East End, an upcoming drama that focuses on a family of witches. It's comprised of Julia Ormond's Joanna Beauchamp and her two daughters, played by Jenna Dewan-Tatum and Rachel Boston.Lifetime电视台即将播出讲述女巫家庭故事的美剧《Witches of East End》充满了ABC台的元素。这部美剧讲的是Julia Ormond扮演的Joanna Beauchamp和她分别由Jenna Dewan-Tatum和Rachel Boston扮演的两个女儿的故事。

The cast also includes Mädchen Amick and Eric Winter.Mädchen Amick和Eric Winter也参演了此剧。

Lifetime ordered a 10-episode first season in January and the series will likely premiere in early 2014.Lifetime电视台在今年1月订购了该剧第一季，正式首播时间可能是2014年年初。

George, meanwhile, will be on recurring status, meaning we can continue to see him from time to time as the husband of Miranda Bailey.George将会作为本剧的一个重复角色出现，他扮演的角色是Miranda Bailey的丈夫。

title: 美剧界刮起巫师风潮 巫师新剧《Witches of East End》演员确定
